articles.author: Jordan Novet
articles.title: Symantec CEO Greg Clark steps down, stock drops CNBC
articles.description: Shares of security company Symantec fell Thursday after the company said its CEO, Greg Clark, has stepped down. The company is looking for a replacement.

articles.author: Phil LeBeau
articles.title: Airfares climb ahead of busy summer travel season CNBC
articles.description: Earlier this week, one-way airfares for most U.S. routes went up $5, the first fare hike this year to impact a majority of domestic flights.

articles.author: Al Root
articles.title: When GM Sold a Plant to an Electric-Vehicle Startup...Named Tesla Barron's
articles.description: Workhorse is buying an idled car plant from General Motors. This isn’t the first time GM has sold a plant cheap to an upstart maker of electric vehicles.
articles.content:

articles.author: Sean O'Kane
articles.title: Delta will test free in-flight Wi-Fi this month The Verge
articles.description: The first of “several phases” of testing will start on May 13th and last for two weeks. Customers on the test flights will be notified by email or on Delta’s mobile app.
articles.content:
Delta Air Lines will test offering free Wi-Fi on 55 domestic daily flights this month. The tests will start on May 13th and last for two weeks, and they will allow users to do just about everything except stream video free of charge. 
Delta calls the tests t… [+1993 chars]
